items.ja: Which teams have qualified for the World Cup and who is on the brink?

items.text_for_match: Which teams have qualified for the World Cup and who is on the brink? BBC Sport's Ask Me Anything team looks at who has qualified for next year's Fifa World Cup. BBC Sport's Ask Me Anything team looks at who has qualified for next year's Fifa World Cup.
